buy.title: SURVIVE AT ALL COSTS
buy.description: Experience new social battle royale game

article.text1: Each round, you and 15 other contestants compete to escape a deadly island filled with monsters. The trick is: three people can survive. Will you run solo or form friendships with others to escape?
article.text2: Making the right decisions could be the difference between life and death.

survive.title: SURVIVE AT ALL COSTS
survive.text: You have 30 minutes to find a relic, signal for extraction, and grab one of three spots on the rescue chopper.

allies.title: CREATE ALLIES AND ENEMIES
allies.text: You have 30 minutes to find a relic, signal for extraction, and grab one of three spots on the rescue chopper.

audience.title: IMPRESS THE AUDIENCE
audience.text: You have 30 minutes to find a relic, signal for extraction, and grab one of three spots on the rescue chopper.

requirement.subtitle: Can My Computer Run this game?
requirement.title: system requirements

os.title: OS:
os.text: Windows 7 64-bit only (No OSX support at this time)

processor.title: Processor:
processor.text: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4 GHZ or AMD Athlon X2 @ 2.8GHZ

graphics.title: Graphics:
graphics.text: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX11 (Shader Model 5)

press.subtitle: What people think?
press.title: Press quotes
press.article: Our goal is to create a product and service that you're satisfied with and use it every day. This is why we're constantly working on our services to make it better every day and really listen to what our users has to say.

evan.name: Evan Lahti
evan.message: “One of my gaming highlights of the year.”

jada.name: Jada Griffin
jada.message: “The next big thing in the world of streaming and survival games.”

aaron.name: Aaron Williams
aaron.message: “Snoop Dogg Playing The Wildly Entertaining 'SOS' Is Ridiculous.”

intouch.subtitle: Want to stay in touch?
intouch.title: newsletter SUBSCRIBE
intouch.article: In order to start receiving our news, all you have to do is enter your email address. Everything else will be taken care of by us. We will send you emails containing information about game. We don't spam.
